00063 //----------------------------------------------------------
00064 GrRenderTargetMgr::GrRenderTargetMgr( unsigned int primaryWidth, unsigned int primaryHeight )
00065 {
00066         B_ASSERT( gGrRenderTargetMgr == 0 );
00067         gGrRenderTargetMgr = this;
00068 
00070         _primaryRT = new GrRenderTarget( primaryWidth, primaryHeight );
00071 }
00072 
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------
00074 GrRenderTargetMgr::~GrRenderTargetMgr()
00075 {
00077         gGrRenderTargetMgr = 0;
00078         CollectGarbage();
00079 }

00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 URef< GrRenderbuffer >
00088 GrRenderTargetMgr::CreateRenderbuffer( unsigned int width, unsigned int height, EFORMAT format )
00089 {
00091         URef< GrRenderbuffer > newRB = new GrRenderbuffer( width, height, bufferFmtMap[ format ] );
00092         _renderBuffers.AddItem( newRB );
00093         return newRB;
00094 }
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 URef< GrTextureBase >
00098 GrRenderTargetMgr::CreateRendertexture( unsigned int width, unsigned int height, EFORMAT format, GrTextureBase::Flags flags,
00099                                                                                 GrTextureBase::ETEXTURETYPE type )
00100 {
00102         flags &= ~GrTextureBase::kBorder;
00103         flags |= GrTextureBase::kNoCompress;
00104 
00106         URef< GrTextureBase > newTex;
00107         if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_CUBE )
00108         {
00110                 B_ASSERT( width == height );
00111                 B_ASSERT( IsPow2( width ) );
00112                 newTex = new GrTextureCube( "rendertexture", textureFmtMap[ format ], width, flags );
00113         }
00114         else if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_2D )
00115         {
00117                 newTex = new GrTexture( "rendertexture", textureFmtMap[ format ], width, height, flags );
00118         }
00119         else if ( type == GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT )
00120         {
00122                 newTex = new GrTextureRect( "rendertexture", textureFmtMap[ format ], width, height );          
00123         }
00124 
00126         _renderTextures.AddItem( newTex );
00127 
00129         return newTex;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //----------------------------------------------------------
00133 URef< GrRenderTarget >
00134 GrRenderTargetMgr::CreateRenderTarget( URef< GrTextureBase > colorTarget )
00135 {
00136         B_ASSERT( colorTarget != 0 );
00137         URef< GrRenderTarget > newRT = new GrRenderTarget( &colorTarget, URef< GrRenderbuffer >( 0 ), 1 );
00138         return AddToRTList( newRT );
00139 }

00144 {
00145         URef< GrRenderTarget > newRT = new GrRenderTarget( &colorTarget, depthBuffer, colorTarget != 0 ? 1 : 0 );
00146         return AddToRTList( newRT );
00147 }

00181 //----------------------------------------------------------
00182 void
00183 GrRenderTargetMgr::CollectGarbage()
00184 {
00186         _renderTargets.CollectGarbage();
00187         _renderBuffers.CollectGarbage();
00188         _renderTextures.CollectGarbage();
00189 }
00190 
00191 //----------------------------------------------------------
00192 void
00193 GrRenderTargetMgr::PreContextReset()
00194 {
00197         B_ASSERT( GrRenderTarget::GetCurrentRT() == GetPrimaryRenderTarget() );
00198         _primaryRT->PreContextReset();
00199 
00201         CollectGarbage();
00202 
00204         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderTargets.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00205                 _renderTargets[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00206 
00208         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderBuffers.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00209                 _renderBuffers[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00210 
00212         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderTextures.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00213                 _renderTextures[ i ]->PreContextReset();
00214 }
00215 
00216 //----------------------------------------------------------
00217 void
00218 GrRenderTargetMgr::PostContextReset()
00219 {
00221         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderBuffers.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00222                 _renderBuffers[ i ]->PostContextReset();
00223 
00225         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderTextures.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00226                 _renderTextures[ i ]->PostContextReset();
00227 
00229         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _renderTargets.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00230                 _renderTargets[ i ]->PostContextReset();
00231 
00232         _primaryRT->PostContextReset();
00233 }

00240 //----------------------------------------------------------
00241 URef< GrRenderTarget >
00242 GrRenderTargetMgr::AddToRTList( URef< GrRenderTarget > target )
00243 {
00244         if ( target->IsValid() )
00245                 _renderTargets.AddItem( target );
00246         else
00247                 target = 0;
00248         return target;
00249 }
